TABLE.NAME: chatbot_history
TABLE.COMMENT: Log of chat messages for block_openai_chat

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the user that sent the message

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the course related to the message

FIELD.NAME: message
FIELD.COMMENT: The message sent by the user

FIELD.NAME: response
FIELD.COMMENT: The reply generated by the AI in response to the user message

FIELD.NAME: response_type
FIELD.COMMENT: The response is static or API

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the message was sent
